LanguageData.AS_WAE_FeatherHelm.label: Feather Helm (Ancient Elf)
LanguageData.AS_WAE_FeatherHelm.description: A helm decorated by putting feathers around the forehead. It looks pretty high performance.
LanguageData.AS_WHE_CuteRibon.label: Cute Ribbon (Half-Elf)
LanguageData.AS_WHE_CuteRibon.description: A cute ribbon that combines strength and cuteness.
